snippet: Officials hope the trial of Bo Xilai will put a full stop to the party’s most embarrassing political scandal in decades. But even if the trial goes as planned, Mr. Bo could end up an unlikely hero.
abstract: Op-Ed article by journalist Pin Ho assesses possibility that disgraced Communist Party official Bo Xilai could end up as an unlikely populist hero; notes that Chinese officials hope his trial will put a full stop to the party's most embarrassing political scandal in decades.
lead_paragraph: Officials hope the trial of Bo Xilai will put a full stop to the party’s most embarrassing political scandal in decades. But even if the trial goes as planned, Mr. Bo could end up an unlikely hero.

headline.main: From Maoist Criminal to Popular Hero?
headline.print_headline: From Maoist Criminal to Popular Hero?
